Package org.sakaiproject.tool.gradebook.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Paging
    The interface between backing beans that need control over paged tables and the paging controller itself.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignmentBean  
    AssignmentDetailsBean  
    AssignmentGradeRow  
    AuthorizationFilterConfigurationBean
    Singleton bean to set up URL filtering by current user's role.
    BulkAssignmentDecoratedBean
    Created to validate pointsPossible during bulk gradebook item creation to catch non-numeric input into that field.
    ConfigurationBean
    Provides a way to override UI bean definitions from the Sakai component framework while still visibly injecting them in UI configuration files.
    CourseGradeDetailsBean  
    CourseGradesToSpreadsheetConverterDefault  
    EnrollmentTableBean
    This is an abstract base class for gradebook dependent backing beans that support searching, sorting, and paging student data.
    EntryServlet
    Redirects the request to the role-appropriate initial view of the gradebook.
    FeedbackOptionsBean
    Provides support for the student feedback options page, which also controls grade-to-percentage mappings for the gradebook.
    GradebookBean
    Provide a UI handle to the selected gradebook.
    GradebookDependentBean  
    GradebookFilePickerServlet  
    GradebookSetupBean  
    GraderRule
    UI for the grader rule select menus
    GraderRulesBean  
    InitializableBean  
    InstructorViewBean
    Provides data for the instructor's view of a student's grades in the gradebook.
    MessagingBean
    A session-scoped bean to handle jsf messages across redirects.
    OverviewBean
    Backing bean for the visible list of assignments in the gradebook.
    OverviewBean.NoChangeMarkerComparator
    Special marker class to preserve the order when saving the sort order
    PreferencesBean
    Session-scoped preferences for the sakai gradebook.
    RemoveAssignmentBean
    Backing Bean for removing assignments from a gradebook.
    RoleFilter
    A role-based authorization filter which takes four parameters: authnServiceBean - The Spring-configured authentication service authzServiceBean - The Spring-configured authorization service role - A string describing which role is required to access this resource selectGradebookRedirect - Where to go if a gradebook doesn't seem to have been selected yet; this can happen on an application redeploy to Tomcat, since JSF beans will be lost but authentication for the session might still be active Because Tomcat 5.* developers decided to take an eccentric interpretation of the ambiguous language in the Servlet specification, Tomcat doesn't accept the combination of directories and wildcards for the "url-pattern" of the filter mapping.
    RosterBean
    Backing bean for the visible list of assignments in the gradebook.
    SpreadsheetRemoveBean
    User: louis Date: Jun 14, 2006 Time: 11:12:51 AM
    SpreadsheetUploadBean  
    StudentViewBean
    Provides data for the student view of the gradebook.
    TestGradebookTool  
    ViewByStudentBean
    Provides data for the student view of the gradebook.
